p: The essential oil from Santolina insularis was also inhibited virus replication against HSV-1 and HSV-2 in vitro (Schnitzler et al. 2008). Its antiviral activity was principally due to direct virucidal effects (De Logu et al. 2000). Lemon balm oil, the essential oil of Melissa officinalis, is capable of exerting a direct antiviral effect on HSV-1 and HSV-2. Considering the lipophilic nature of essential oils, which enable it to penetrate the skin, and a high selectivity index, essential oils might be suitable for topical treatment of herpetic infections (Schnitzler et al. 2008).
